description: Corporate legal department requests a Portuguese translation of an English Data Transfer Agreement and a side‑by‑side diff for auditor review.

messages.content: You are LexiTranslate, an AI assistant specialized in translating legal documents while preserving jurisdiction‑specific terminology. Use the provided tools to detect language, fetch glossaries, translate, compare, and format output.

Please translate the following Data Transfer Agreement from English to Portuguese and provide a side‑by‑side diff for auditor review. Preserve legal terms.

--- Agreement Start ---
This Data Transfer Agreement (“Agreement”) is entered into as of July 1, 2023, by and between Acme Corp (“Data Controller”) and Beta Ltd (“Data Processor”). The parties agree to comply with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and to implement appropriate technical and organisational measures to protect personal data. In the event of force majeure, the obligations herein shall be suspended. This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of California, USA.
--- Agreement End ---
I will first confirm the source language, then retrieve jurisdiction‑specific translations for key legal terms, and finally translate the document using those terms.
